topics.title: Network Security Fundamentals
topics.content:
Common Network Devices

  • Firewall: Controls incoming and outgoing network traffic based on security rules
  • Router: Layer 3 device that connects different networks using IP addresses
  • Switch: Layer 2 device that forwards data based on MAC addresses

topics.title: OSI Model Overview
topics.content:
Seven Layers of OSI

  1. Layer 7 Application Layer
  2. Layer 6 Presentation Layer
  3. Layer 5 Session Layer
  4. Layer 4 Transport Layer

Understanding these layers is crucial for network troubleshooting.

topics.title: TCP Three-Way Handshake
topics.content:
1. SYN Client sends synchronization request
  2. SYN-ACK Server acknowledges and responds
  3. ACK Client confirms connection established

This establishes a reliable connection between client and server.
